price: 161. Markuu walaalkood Luud ku yidhi: “Ma waydaan iska jireyn (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale)?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
